description: One Box - Two Digital Tuners - Anywhere on Your Network/Dual Digital Network Attached Tuner Device/Watch - Pause - Record Digital and HD Content from Over-the-Air and Cable from any computer on your home network system.  Cross OS Compatible with Windows/MAC/Linux.  Total Media DVR software included.
title: SiliconDust HDHomeRun HDHR-US Dual Networked High Definition Digital Tuner Device (White)
